entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 5.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • EMA: Remove the special handling of comments by @akirk in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1401
  • Outbox: Account for user option prefix and added meta data by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1402
  • Fix: Send a create as a first activity by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1408
  • Release 5.4.1 by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1409
  • Fix: Fediverse Previews by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1425
  • Re-Add: Announce Updates and Deletes by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1423
  • Move: Add docs for Mastodon migrations by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1416
  • Outbox: Don't schedule event when there are no followers by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1426
  • Replies Context: Account for single user mode by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1427
  • Fix Preview Warning when no Tags provided by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1438
  • Admin: Fix warnings on image crop by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1419
  • Tags: Skip processing when empty by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1442
  • Transformer: Make sure field exists before using it by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1443
  • Use Title Case consistently by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1432
  • Use add_settings_section also for Welcome-Screen by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1440
  • Version: Use masked version in more places by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1448
  • Added Constants to Site-Health debug informations by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1445
  • Docs: update to mention changelog and release changes by @jeherve in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1454
  • Add basic relay support! by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1291
  • Changelogger: automatically create a changelog entry from info extracted from PR description by @jeherve in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1456
  • Return proper ID instead of object by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1453
  • @-name rewrites: don't redirect to slashed version by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1447
  • User: Don't fall back to global post when looking for avatar by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1460
  • Remove unused sanitize_url by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1462
  • Fixed default value for activitypub_authorized_fetch by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1465
  • Recommend two new plugins by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1450
  • Actors: Add utility function to get actor type by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1473
  • Settings: Use permalink settings design for actor mode by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1472
  • Lock settings based on constants by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1430

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/5.4.1...5.5.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 5.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Preview: Check attachments before using them by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1478
  • Fix spacing issue by @edent in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1477
  • Changelog: allow generating a changelog entry from the PR description in a fork, too. by @jeherve in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1479
  • Outbox: Add support for full activities by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1474
  • Fix CLI commands by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1481
  • Move: Differentiate between internal and external Move by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1413
  • Fixed: Do not escape slashes in json_encode by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1488
  • Interaction: Fix deleting comments by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1485
  • Fix avatar issue on WP.com by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1491
  • Fix site-health check by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1487
  • Rest API: Use Collection and CollectionPage more accurately by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1444
  • Do a little advertising for WordPress by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1493
  • Actor Update: Add Updated by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1495
  • Fix: Announces by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1500
  • Fix: (Pixelfed) Follow by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1501
  • Bail when $post is not a post by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1507
  • Interactions: Fallback when actor is not defined by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1508
  • Remote Reply: Improve logged-out display by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1509
  • Onboarding: Redirect to "Welcome" page after plugin activation. by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1511
  • Onboarding: Allow skipping the welcome page by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1504
  • Add interaction settings by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1395
  • Dispatcher: Adhere to passed batch size. by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1514
  • Fix: Delete Undone comments instead of trashing them by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1520
  • Fix: Do not send self-replies by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1517
  • Move: use $from for object in Move::internally by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1516
  • Move: Add a Mastodon importer by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1502
  • Import: Don't federate new attachments by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1526
  • Mentions: Standardize around only displaying username by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1510
  • Fix: Properly traverse the object hierarchy to get the ID by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1518
  • Move: use $from for object in Move::externally by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1531
  • Scheduler: Don't federate Deletes of unfederated posts. by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1528

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/5.5.0...5.6.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 5.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Advanced Settings by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1449
  • Site Health: Fix issue 1545 and add some additional informations by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1547
  • Reply Block: Embed referenced post when possible by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1100
  • Onboarding: Improve troubleshooting UI by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1546
  • Add: New Health checks by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1524
  • Add: Shared Inbox setting by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1553
  • Actors: Don't convert non-numeric strings to Blog user id by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1554
  • Add: Vary header settings by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1552
  • Reply: Make Mastodon embeds work by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1555
  • Follow Me: add a button-only mode by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1133
  • Move: support same-server domain migrations by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1530
  • Import: Load on admin_init by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1561
  • Outbox: Properly handle username requests by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1559
  • Fix: Missing Actor in Outbox-Activities by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1564
  • Upgrades: Delete orphaned extra fields by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1566
  • Transformers: Allow setting properties to false. by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1567
  • Signature: Add compat for more key encodings by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1557
  • Fix: Show error if site uses "Almost Pretty Permalink" structure by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1570

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/5.6.1...5.7.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 5.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • EMA: Fix PHP Warning by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1583
  • Update tested-up-to version by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1584
  • Mention Email: Add notification option by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1577
  • Update New Follower Template by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1581
  • DM notification: Convert to HTML email by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1582
  • Importer: Add support for video and audio files by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1585
  • Fix a Undefined array key "headers" issue by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1594
  • Embed: Add Fediverse fallback to oembed attempts by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1576
  • Inbox: Apply disallowed list before processing by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1590
  • Remote Reply: Set script translations by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1595
  • Import: Convert to blocks and add reply by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1591
  • Directly link to a help tab. by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1598
  • Make notification settings user-specific by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1586
  • Add support for Multisite Language Switcher by @MatzeKitt in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1604
  • Fix: Add user context to global inbox by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1603

New Contributors

  • @MatzeKitt made their first contribution in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1604

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/5.7.0...5.8.0
